name: time_command_established
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which incident command is established.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_sizeup_completed
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which initial incident sizeup is complete.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_suppression_complete
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which suppression is complete.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_primary_search_begin
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which primary search operations begin.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_primary_search_complete
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which primary search operations are complete.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_water_on_fire
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which water is first applied to fire.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_fire_under_control
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which fire is considered contained (e.g. in a wildfire), but not yet extinguished.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_fire_knocked_down
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which fire is has been knocked down.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.

name: time_extrication_complete
format: An ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with offset.
definition: Timestamp at which extrication (motor vehicle, technical rescue) has been completed.
comments: On an incident basis. In UTC: ISO 8601 formatted datetime string with 00:00 offset.
